title: Which is the best site for lyrics of Hindi film songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many years back, when the internet was in its infancy a group of enthusiastic people put together the iTRANS song book which was basically crowdsourced set of lyrics to mostly old Hindi film songs. This was taken over to a webpage and is still maintained. It remains the best source of lyrics of old songs: giitaayan - Hindi Songs Lyrics
